entry.title: $2100 // Close to F/G in Red Hook, SS appliances, Sun-Soaked TRUE 2 bed
entry.content:
Sun-soaked 2 bed /1 bath in this building, was recently gut renovated and are priced to rent! Everything from the floors to the bathroom tiles have has been updated. With bedrooms on opposite ends of the apartment, you will have a common living room with open kitchen. Hardwood floors are designer gray. Sleek modern finishes in the kitchen including: marble, stainless steel appliances, white cabinets and sea foam green glass backsplash.



Just a 10 minute walk to the F/G train -- and over Hamilton avenue to all of Court Streets best restaurants. A short stroll to Van Brunt. Live in Red Hook without having to rely on B61 everyday. You will be near Red Hook Lobster Pound, Jalopy Tavern, Red Hook Ice House, DeFontes and the new Ample Hills Factory.



Email today to set up a viewing. Pets are on approval.
